title: Jordan Peterson is nothing like Atheist Clergy
description:
Noel Plum sees Jordan Peterson like Atheist Clergy. If you listen to Atheist Clergy they sound very different. Atheist clergy bring the death of churches. Peterson won't close the door on God because of what he's experienced. 

My first video on Noel Plum https://youtu.be/h1rQXjqJ_mQ
Noel Plum on JBP https://youtu.be/nSL6a52UEgI
Atheists in the Pulpit https://youtu.be/hTme-3nz8q4
John Suk on Gretta Vosper http://faithisntwhatyouthink.blogspot.com/2016/01/what-do-we-do-about-gretta-vosper.html 
Liberated Hymns https://youtu.be/Aru1z756tyk
JBP's Vision https://youtu.be/NgOSb5rGYg4
Tim Keller book on Prayer https://www.amazon.com/Prayer-Experiencing-Awe-Intimacy-God-ebook/dp/B00INIXGIO 

The Hiding Place by Corrie Ten Boom https://www.amazon.com/Hiding-Place-Corrie-Ten-Boom-ebook/dp/B004TS1MGK

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
